kw.name: Open Connection
kw.doc: Opens a new SSH connection to the given ``host`` and ``port``.

kw.name: Login
kw.msg: Read output: Last login: Wed Feb 26 15:53:19 2025 from 10.100.1.52 [?2004h[root@CBM-2022070504 ~]#
kw.doc: Logs into the SSH server with the given ``username`` and ``password``.

kw.name: Execute Command
kw.doc: Executes ``command`` on the remote machine and returns its outputs.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

test.name: Ping

kw.name: Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg:
PING 10.57.0.255 (10.57.0.255) 56(84) bytes of data.
--- 10.57.0.255 ping statistics --- 5 packets transmitted, 0 received, 100% packet loss, time 4111ms
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg:
PING 10.57.0.255 (10.57.0.255) 56(84) bytes of data.
--- 10.57.0.255 ping statistics --- 5 packets transmitted, 0 received, 100% packet loss, time 4111ms
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.arg: "100% packet loss" in """${ping_output.stdout}""" or "100% packet unanswered" in """${ping_output.stderr}"""
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.arg: "Expected 100% packet loss, but some responses were received."
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

test.doc: Führt das PING-Kommando direkt mit dem festgelegten Interface von testmachine aus und überprüft die Ausgabe.

test.name: Run ICMP Timestamp

kw.name: Run Process
kw.msg: Starting process: echo toor | sudo -S hping3 --icmp-ts -c 10 10.57.0.255
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: [sudo] password for exceeding: --- 10.57.0.255 hping statistic --- 10 packets transmitted, 0 packets received, 100% packet loss round-trip min/avg/max = 0.0/0.0/0.0 ms HPING 10.57.0.255 (enp2s0f1 10.57.0.255): icmp mode set, 28 headers + 0 data bytes
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: [sudo] password for exceeding: --- 10.57.0.255 hping statistic --- 10 packets transmitted, 0 packets received, 100% packet loss round-trip min/avg/max = 0.0/0.0/0.0 ms HPING 10.57.0.255 (enp2s0f1 10.57.0.255): icmp mode set, 28 headers + 0 data bytes
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.arg: "100% packet loss" in """${ICMP_output.stdout}""" or "100% unanswered" in """${ICMP_output.stderr}"""
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.arg: "Expected 100% packet loss, but some responses were received."
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

test.doc: Führt das ICMP Timestamp-Kommando direkt mit dem festgelegten Interface von testmachine aus und überprüft die Ausgabe.
